item.title: McClennen appears on RT's Watching the Hawks
item.description: RT’s “Watching the Hawks” with Tabetha Wallace, Tyrel Ventura, and Sean Stone had me as a guest to talk about the power of satire news. Watch here.

item.title: Where to Invade Next
item.description: The movie poster for Michael Moore’s new film, Where to Invade Next, includes a blurb from my Salon review.
